metadata.title: USN-2627-1 -- t1utils vulnerability
metadata.description: Jakub Wilk discovered that t1utils incorrectly handled certain malformed fonts. If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a specially crafted font, a remote attacker could crash the application, leading to a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code with user privileges.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2627-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  t1utils - 1.37-2ubuntu1.1 No subscription required
